meanings.sent1: The canaliculus allowed water to flow through the rock.
meanings.sent2: The irrigation system had a canaliculus to direct water to the crops.
meanings.sent3: The ants used the canaliculus as a shortcut to their nest.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed through the canaliculus of the cave.
meanings.sent5: The canaliculus was so narrow, only a small fish could swim through.

meanings.sent1: The canaliculus in the wood was perfect for guiding the saw.
meanings.sent2: The canaliculus in the field indicated where the water had flowed.
meanings.sent3: The canaliculus on the record made the needle jump.
meanings.sent4: His wrinkled forehead had a canaliculus from years of frowning.
meanings.sent5: The canaliculus on the leaf looked like a tiny road for insects.
